title:
On the semigroup of monoid endomorphisms of the semigroup
  $\mathscr{C}_{+}(a,b)$
abstract:
Let $\mathscr{C}_{+}(a,b)$ be the submooid of the bicyclic monoid which which
is studied in \cite{Makanjuola-Umar=1997}. We describe monoid endomorphisms of
the semigroup $\mathscr{C}_{+}(a,b)$ which are generated by the family of all
congruences of the bicyclic monoid and all injective monoid endomorphisms of
$\mathscr{C}_{+}(a,b)$.
